column4: it would be nice if there is an icon for spreadubuntu.com so i cut put it in my blog :D

Beernix?

ic ... hahaha... the "Beernix" sounds cool enough :D
point for you... ;)
thx :D
not every release is an LTS release
and why is that? i've been looking in the wiki and can't find the answer
LTS is for corporate enviroments & such, were they don't *want* to update everything every 6 months, and where 18months of support isn't long enough
one more questions, are the LTS versions would be release in every 2 years or how many months?
it sounds like every 3rd release is going to be LTS - possibly - so every 18 months
thanks a lot for your information :)
